duties_responsibilities.duty: Setup, configure, support, and maintain newly implemented Oracle Cloud ERP system.
Serve as the subject matter expert for system enhancements and work with the finance team in developing project plans for deployment.
Participate in new technology testing, deployment, and support.
Provide ongoing maintenance and support, including upgrades to related software systems, developing reports, and incident resolution.
Test financial system applications during system changes including enhancements, upgrades, and maintenance.
Collaborate with finance teams to prioritize objectives and address issues.
Build and maintain internal resources for end users and provide ongoing training.
Assist in integrations, perform validations, and ensure data flows downstream as required.
Develop various reports (OTBI, FRWS, Smart View, BIP, Dashboards, ad hoc, etc.)
Create policies and procedures that will improve the overall operation and effectiveness of the systems, department, and company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree preferred (major in Computer Science, Information Science, Accounting, or similar field) or equivalent experience.
5+ years of a combination of experience in information systems management, or accounting systems management.
Experience with OTBI, FRWS, Smart View, BIP is a plus.
Cloud ERP system experience (Oracle a plus)
Some weekend and holiday availability required
